mil7.5.5:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘nakulassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.5.5:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, nakulo uragamupagacchanto bhesajjena kāyaṃ paribhāvetvā uragamupagacchati gahetuṃ;

mil7.5.5:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kodhāghātabahulaṃ kalahaviggahavivādavirodhābhibhūtaṃ lokamupagacchantena mettābhesajjena mānasaṃ anulimpitabbaṃ.

mil7.5.5:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, nakulassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.6:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘jarasiṅgālassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.5.6:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, jarasiṅgālo bhojanaṃ paṭilabhitvā ajigucchamāno yāvadatthaṃ āharayati;

mil7.5.6:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena bhojanaṃ paṭilabhitvā ajigucchamānena sarīrayāpanamattameva paribhuñjitabbaṃ.

mil7.5.6:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, jarasiṅgālassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.6:5.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, jarasiṅgālo bhojanaṃ paṭilabhitvā na vicināti lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vāti;

mil7.5.6:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena bhojanaṃ paṭilabhitvā na vicinitabbaṃ ‘lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā sampannaṃ vā asampannaṃ vā’ti, yathāladdhena santussitabbaṃ.

mil7.5.6:5.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, jarasiṅgālassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.7:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘migassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.5.7:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, migo divā araññe carati, rattiṃ abbhokāse;

mil7.5.7:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena divā araññe viharitabbaṃ, rattiṃ abbhokāse.

mil7.5.7:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, migassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.7:3.1.pli: ‘So kho ahaṃ, sāriputta, yā tā rattiyo sītā hemantikā antaraṭṭhakā himapātasamayā, tathārūpāsu rattīsu rattiṃ abbhokāse viharāmi, divā vanasaṇḍe.

mil7.5.7:3.2.pli: Gimhānaṃ pacchime māse divā abbhokāse viharāmi, rattiṃ vanasaṇḍe’ti.

mil7.5.7:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, migo sattimhi vā sare vā opatante vañceti palāyati, na kāyamupaneti;

mil7.5.7:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kilesesu opatantesu vañcayitabbaṃ palāyitabbaṃ, na cittamupanetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.7:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, migassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.7:5.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, migo manusse disvā yena vā tena vā palāyati ‘mā maṃ te addasaṃsū’ti;

mil7.5.7:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena bhaṇḍanakalahaviggahavivādasīle dussīle kusīte saṅgaṇikārāme disvā yena vā tena vā palāyitabbaṃ ‘mā maṃ te addasaṃsu, ahañca te mā addasan’ti.

mil7.5.7:5.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, migassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.8:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘gorūpassa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.5.8:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, gorūpo sakaṃ gehaṃ na vijahati;

mil7.5.8:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sako kāyo na vijahitabbo ‘aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanavikiraṇaviddhaṃsanadhammo ayaṃ kāyo’ti.

mil7.5.8:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, gorūpassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.8:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, gorūpo ādinnadhuro sukhadukkhena dhuraṃ vahati;

mil7.5.8:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ādinnabrahmacariyena sukhadukkhena yāva jīvitapariyādānā āpāṇakoṭikaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritabbaṃ.

mil7.5.8:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, gorūpassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.8:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, gorūpo chandena ghāyamāno pānīyaṃ pivati;

mil7.5.8:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ anusiṭṭhi chandena pemena pasādena ghāyamānena paṭiggahetabbā.

mil7.5.8:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, gorūpassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.8:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, gorūpo yena kenaci vāhiyamāno vahati;

mil7.5.8:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena theranavamajjhimabhikkhūnampi gihiupāsakassāpi ovādānusāsanī sirasā sampaṭicchitabbā.

mil7.5.8:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, gorūpassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.9:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘varāhassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.5.9:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, varāho santattakaṭhite gimhasamaye sampatte udakaṃ upagacchati;

mil7.5.9:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena dosena citte āluḷitakhalitavibbhantasantatte sītalāmatapaṇītamettābhāvanaṃ upagantabbaṃ.

mil7.5.9:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, varāhassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.5.9:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, varāho cikkhallamudakamupagantvā nāsikāya pathaviṃ khaṇitvā doṇiṃ katvā doṇikāya sayati;

mil7.5.9:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena mānase kāyaṃ nikkhipitvā ārammaṇantaragatena sayitabbaṃ.

mil7.5.9:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, varāhassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.1:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘sīhassa satta aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni satta aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.6.1:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena setavimalaparisuddhapaṇḍaracittena byapagatakukkuccena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.6.1:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sīhassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.1:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sīho catucaraṇo vikkantacārī;

mil7.6.1:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena caturiddhipādacaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.6.1:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sīhassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.1:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena abhirūparucirasīlakesarinā bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.6.1:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sīhassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.1:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sīho jīvitapariyādānepi na kassaci onamati;

mil7.6.1:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārapariyādānepi na kassaci onamitabbaṃ.

mil7.6.1:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sīhassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.1:5.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sīho sapadānabhakkho yasmiṃ okāse nipatati, tattheva yāvadatthaṃ bhakkhayati, na varamaṃsaṃ vicināti;

mil7.6.1:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sapadānabhakkhena bhavitabbaṃ, na kulāni vicinitabbāni, na pubbagehaṃ hitvā kulāni upasaṅkamitabbāni, na bhojanaṃ vicinitabbaṃ, yasmiṃ okāse kabaḷaṃ ādīyati, tasmiṃyeva okāse bhuñjitabbaṃ sarīrayāpanatthaṃ, na varabhojanaṃ vicinitabbaṃ.

mil7.6.1:5.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sīhassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.1:6.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sīho asannidhibhakkho, sakiṃ gocaraṃ bhakkhayitvā na puna taṃ upagacchati;

mil7.6.1:6.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena asannidhikāraparibhoginā bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.6.1:6.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sīhassa chaṭṭhaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.1:7.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sīho bhojanaṃ aladdhā na paritassati, laddhāpi bhojanaṃ agadhito amucchito anajjhosanno paribhuñjati;

mil7.6.1:7.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena bhojanaṃ aladdhā na paritassitabbaṃ, laddhāpi bhojanaṃ agadhitena amucchitena anajjhosannena ādīnavadassāvinā nissaraṇapaññena paribhuñjitabbaṃ.

mil7.6.1:7.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sīhassa sattamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.1:7.4.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena saṃyuttanikāyavare theraṃ mahākassapaṃ parikittayamānena—

mil7.6.1:8.1.pli: ‘Santuṭṭhoyaṃ, bhikkhave, kassapo itarītarena piṇḍapātena, itarītarapiṇḍapātasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī, na ca piṇḍapātahetu anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ āpajjati, aladdhā ca piṇḍapātaṃ na paritassati, laddhā ca piṇḍapātaṃ agadhito amucchito anajjhosanno ādīnavadassāvī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjatī’”ti.

mil7.6.10:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘ajagarassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.6.10:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, ajagaro mahatimahākāyo bahūpi divase ūnūdaro dīnataro kucchipūraṃ āhāraṃ na labhati, aparipuṇṇo yeva yāvadeva sarīrayāpanamattakena yāpeti;

mil7.6.10:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yogino yogāvacarassa bhikkhācariyappasutassa parapiṇḍamupagatassa paradinnappāṭikaṅkhissa sayaṅgāhappaṭiviratassa dullabhaṃ udaraparipūraṃ āhāraṃ, api ca atthavasikena kulaputtena cattāro pañca ālope abhuñjitvā avasesaṃ udakena paripūretabbaṃ.

mil7.6.10:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, ajagarassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.2:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘cakkavākassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānīti”?

mil7.6.2:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, cakkavāko yāva jīvitapariyādānā dutiyikaṃ na vijahati;

mil7.6.2:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yāva jīvitapariyādānā yoniso manasikāro na vijahitabbo.

mil7.6.2:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavākassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.2:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavāko sevālapaṇakabhakkho, tena ca santuṭṭhiṃ āpajjati, tāya ca santuṭṭhiyā balena ca vaṇṇena ca na parihāyati;

mil7.6.2:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yathālābhasantoso karaṇīyo, yathālābhasantuṭṭho kho, mahārāja, yogī yogāvacaro na parihāyati sīlena, na parihāyati samādhinā, na parihāyati paññāya, na parihāyati vimuttiyā, na parihāyati vimuttiñāṇadassanena, na parihāyati sabbehi kusalehi dhammehi.

mil7.6.2:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavākassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.2:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavāko pāṇe na viheṭhayati;

mil7.6.2:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena nihitadaṇḍena nihitasatthena lajjinā dayāpannena sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampinā bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.6.2:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavākassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.3:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘peṇāhikāya dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.6.3:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, peṇāhikā sakapatimhi usūyāya chāpake na posayati;

mil7.6.3:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sakamane kilese uppanne usūyāyitabbaṃ, satipaṭṭhānena sammāsaṃvarasusire pakkhipitvā manodvāre kāyagatāsati bhāvetabbā.

mil7.6.3:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, peṇāhikāya paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.3:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, peṇāhikā pavane divasaṃ gocaraṃ caritvā sāyaṃ pakkhigaṇaṃ upeti attano guttiyā;

mil7.6.3:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ekakena pavivekaṃ sevitabbaṃ saṃyojanaparimuttiyā, tatra ratiṃ alabhamānena upavādabhayaparirakkhaṇāya saṅghaṃ osaritvā saṅgharakkhitena vasitabbaṃ.

mil7.6.3:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, peṇāhikāya dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.3:2.4.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, brahmunā sahampatinā bhagavato santike—

mil7.6.4:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘gharakapotassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.6.4:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, gharakapoto paragehe vasamāno na tesaṃ kiñci bhaṇḍassa nimittaṃ gaṇhāti, majjhatto vasati saññābahulo;

mil7.6.4:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena parakulaṃ upagatena tasmiṃ kule itthīnaṃ vā purisānaṃ vā mañce vā pīṭhe vā vatthe vā alaṅkāre vā upabhoge vā paribhoge vā bhojanavikatīsu vā na nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ, majjhattena bhavitabbaṃ, samaṇasaññā paccupaṭṭhapetabbā.

mil7.6.4:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, gharakapotassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.5:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘ulūkassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.6.5:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, ulūko kākehi paṭiviruddho, rattiṃ kākasaṅghaṃ gantvā bahūpi kāke hanati;

mil7.6.5:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena aññāṇena paṭiviruddho kātabbo, ekena raho nisīditvā aññāṇaṃ sampamadditabbaṃ, mūlato chinditabbaṃ.

mil7.6.5:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, ulūkassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.5:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, ulūko suppaṭisallīno hoti;

mil7.6.5:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena paṭisallānārāmena bhavitabbaṃ paṭisallānaratena.

mil7.6.5:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, ulūkassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.5:3.1.pli: ‘Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisallānārāmo paṭisallānarato “idaṃ dukkhan”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī’”ti.

mil7.6.6:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘satapattassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.6.6:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, satapatto ravitvā paresaṃ khemaṃ vā bhayaṃ vā ācikkhati;

mil7.6.6:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena paresaṃ dhammaṃ desayamānena vinipātaṃ bhayato dassayitabbaṃ, nibbānaṃ khemato dassayitabbaṃ.

mil7.6.6:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, satapattassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.7:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘vaggulissa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.6.7:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, vagguli gehaṃ pavisitvā vicaritvā nikkhamati, na tattha palibuddhati;

mil7.6.7:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā sapadānaṃ vicaritvā paṭiladdhalābhena khippameva nikkhamitabbaṃ, na tattha palibuddhena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.6.7:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vaggulissa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.7:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, vagguli paragehe vasamāno na tesaṃ parihāniṃ karoti;

mil7.6.7:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kulāni upasaṅkamitvā atiyācanāya vā viññattibahulatāya vā kāyadosabahulatāya vā atibhāṇitāya vā samānasukhadukkhatāya vā na tesaṃ koci vippaṭisāro karaṇīyo, napi tesaṃ mūlakammaṃ parihāpetabbaṃ, sabbathā vaḍḍhiyeva icchitabbā.

mil7.6.7:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vaggulissa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.7:2.4.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena dīghanikāyavare lakkhaṇasuttante—

mil7.6.8:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘jalūkāya ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.6.8:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, jalūkā yattha allīyati, tattheva daḷhaṃ allīyitvā ruhiraṃ pivati;

mil7.6.8:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittaṃ allīyati, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vaṇṇato ca saṇṭhānato ca disato ca okāsato ca paricchedato ca liṅgato ca nimittato ca daḷhaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā tenevārammaṇena vimuttirasamasecanakaṃ pātabbaṃ.

mil7.6.8:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, jalūkāya ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.9:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘sappassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.6.9:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena paññāya caritabbaṃ, paññāya caramānassa kho, mahārāja, yogino cittaṃ ñāye carati, vilakkhaṇaṃ vivajjeti, salakkhaṇaṃ bhāveti.

mil7.6.9:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sappassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.9:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sappo caramāno osadhaṃ parivajjento carati;

mil7.6.9:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena duccaritaṃ parivajjentena caritabbaṃ.

mil7.6.9:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sappassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.9:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sappo manusse disvā tappati socati cintayati;

mil7.6.9:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kuvitakke, vitakketvā aratiṃ uppādayitvā tappitabbaṃ socitabbaṃ cintayitabbaṃ ‘pamādena me divaso vītināmito, na so puna sakkā laddhun’ti.

mil7.6.9:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sappassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.6.9:3.4.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā bhallāṭiyajātake dvinnaṃ kinnarānaṃ—

mil7.7.1:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘panthamakkaṭakassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.7.1:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, panthamakkaṭako panthe makkaṭajālavitānaṃ katvā yadi tattha jālake laggati kimi vā makkhikā vā paṭaṅgo vā, taṃ gahetvā bhakkhayati;

mil7.7.1:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena chasu dvāresu satipaṭṭhānajālavitānaṃ katvā yadi tattha kilesamakkhikā bajjhanti, tattheva ghātetabbā.

mil7.7.1:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, panthamakkaṭakassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.10:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘tacchakassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.7.10:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, tacchako kāḷasuttaṃ anulometvā rukkhaṃ tacchati;

mil7.7.10:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena jinasāsanamanulomayitvā sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā saddhāhatthena paññāvāsiṃ gahetvā kilesā tacchetabbā.

mil7.7.10:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, tacchakassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.10:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, tacchako phegguṃ apaharitvā sāramādiyati;

mil7.7.10:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sassataṃ ucchedaṃ taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīraṃ aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīraṃ taduttamaṃ aññaduttamaṃ akatamabhabbaṃ apurisakāraṃ abrahmacariyavāsaṃ sattavināsaṃ navasattapātubhāvaṃ saṅkhārasassatabhāvaṃ yo karoti, so paṭisaṃvedeti, añño karoti, añño paṭisaṃvedeti, kammaphaladassanā ca kiriyaphaladiṭṭhi ca iti evarūpāni ceva aññāni ca vivādapathāni apanetvā saṅkhārānaṃ sabhāvaṃ paramasuññataṃ nirīhanijjīvataṃ accantaṃ suññataṃ ādiyitabbaṃ.

mil7.7.10:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, tacchakassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.2:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘thanassitadārakassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.7.2:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, thanassitadārako sadatthe laggati, khīratthiko rodati;

mil7.7.2:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sadatthe laggitabbaṃ, sabbattha dhammañāṇena bhavitabbaṃ, uddese paripucchāya sammappayoge paviveke garusaṃvāse kalyāṇamittasevane.

mil7.7.2:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, thanassitadārakassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.7.2:1.5.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena dīghanikāyavare parinibbānasuttante—

mil7.7.2:2.1.pli: ‘Iṅgha tumhe, ānanda, sāratthe ghaṭatha, sāratthe anuyuñjatha, sāratthe appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharathā’”ti.

mil7.7.3:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘cittakadharakummassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.7.3:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, cittakadharakummo udakabhayā udakaṃ parivajjetvā vicarati, tāya ca pana udakaṃ parivajjanāya āyunā na parihāyati;

mil7.7.3:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena pamāde bhayadassāvinā bhavitabbaṃ, appamāde guṇavisesadassāvinā.

mil7.7.3:1.4.pli: Tāya ca pana bhayadassāvitāya na parihāyati sāmaññā, nibbānassa santike upeti.

mil7.7.3:1.5.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, cittakadharakummassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
